33.ara-name: كتاب الفتن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Ibn 'Umar narrated that the Messenger of Allah(s.a.w) said:"You shall fight the Jews. You will gain such control over them, that a rock will say: 'O Muslim! This Jew is behind me so kill him

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي عَلاَمَةِ الدَّجَّالِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Signs of the Dajjal
